title: Numbers
sentences: años y estudio en el instituto.
I am fifteen years old and I study at high school.
This book costs twenty euros in the shop.
Can you give me three red apples, please?
In my class there are thirty students.
I live at number seven on this street.
de la mañana y tengo sueño.
It is eight in the morning and I am sleepy.
There are a hundred people waiting in the square.
Mi número de teléfono tiene muchos
My phone number has many zeros.
I need ten minutes to finish my homework.
The plane ticket costs five hundred dollars.
Today is the fourth day of my vacation.
I have two brothers older than me.
Can you bring me six glasses for dinner?
There are fifty pages left to finish the book.
My grandmother turns eighty years old this Sunday.
There are twelve months in a year.
Compré una docena de huevos, son
I bought a dozen eggs, they are twelve units.
Do you have fifty cents for coffee?
The train leaves in forty minutes.
We are four people in my family.
How much is nine plus one?
There are a thousand grams in a kilo.
My house is three hundred meters from here.
Can you count to a hundred in Spanish?
dictionary:
